definition[0]: always behaving in the same way or having the same attitudes, standards etc – usually used to show approval
example[0]: She’s the team’s most consistent player.
example[1]: We need to be consistent in our approach.
definition[1]: continuing to happen or develop in the same way
example[2]: a consistent improvement in the country’s economy
definition[2]: a consistent argument or idea does not have any parts that do not match other parts
